SUCCESS.CREATED: Welcome to BioArt! Your account has been created
SUCCESS.NO_CONTENT: The request was successful but there is no content to return
SUCCESS.VERIFIED: The User has been verified successfully
SUCCESS.UPDATED: The User has been updated successfully
SUCCESS.ADDED: The item has been added successfully
SUCCESS.OTP_SENT_EMAIL: OTP sent successfully. Check your inbox
SUCCESS.OTP_SENT_MOBILE: OTP sent successfully. Check your message
SUCCESS.OTP_VERIFIED: The OTP has been verified successfully
SUCCESS.SUBSCRIPTION_SUCCESS: You're now subscribed to BioArt updates

GENERIC.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred on the server
GENERIC.BAD_REQUEST: The request was invalid or cannot be otherwise served
GENERIC.UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication credentials were missing or incorrect
GENERIC.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to access this resource
GENERIC.NOT_FOUND: The requested resource could not be found

USER.PHONE_ALREADY_EXISTS: Mobile already in use please try signing in
USER.SAME_VALUE_UPDATE: The value provided is the same as the current value

USER.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many incorrect attempts. Please request a new OTP

USER.SOCIAL_USER_MANUAL_LOGIN_BLOCKED: This account is registered via social login

USER.CONTACT_SUBMITTED_FAILED: We couldn't send your message. Please try again
USER.SHIPPING_NOT_AVAILABLE: Shipping is not available to the provided address
USER.EMAIL_FAILED: Failed to send email. Please try again
USER.ADDRESS_UPDATE_FAILURE: Address update failed. Please try again
